name: Richard Wildes
content: Richard P. Wildes Richard P. Wildes Associate Professor Department of Electrical Engineering and Computer Science and Centre for Vision Research York University Mailing address Department of Electrical Engineering and Computer Science York University 4700 Keele Street Toronto, Ontario M3J 1P3 Alternative coordinates Tel: (416)-736-2100 x40203 Fax: (416)-736-5872 Office: 3032 LAS email: wildes@cse.yorku.ca Research Areas of Interest Computer Vision Image Processing Robotics Artificial Intelligence Publications Lab Teaching CSE 6323 Advanced Topics in Computer Vision (Winter 2014, Winter 2016) CSE 6333 Multiple View Image Understanding (Winter 2006, Winter 2010, Winter 2012, Winter 2013) CSE 4422/5323 Computer Vision (Fall 2001 - Fall 2005, Fall 2008, Fall 2010, Fall 2012 - Fall 2013, Fall 2017) CSE 1020 Introduction to Computer Science I (Winter 2002, Winter 2004, Summer 2013, Summer 2014) CSE 1001 Research Directions in Computing (Year 2012 - 2017) Service Associate Director, Vision Science to Applications (2016-present) Associate Director, Centre for Vision Research (2013-2014) Chair, Department of Electrical Engineering and Computer Science (2014-2017) Executive Committee, Department of Computer Science and Engineering (2006-2011, 2014-2017) Faculty Hiring Committee, Department of Computer Science and Engineering (2008-09, 2010-2011, 2012-2013, 2015-2016) Faculty Senate, York University (2014-present) Graduate Admissions Committee, Department of Computer Science and Engineering (2001-2002, 2006-2011, 2012-2016) Graduate Programme Director, Department of Computer Science and Engineering (2006-2011) Planning, Academic Resources and Research Committee, Lassonde School of Engineering (2013-2014) Research Committee, Department of Computer Science and Engineering (2012-2013, 2014-2015) Steering Committee, Centre for Vision Research (2002-2006, 2009-2011, 2013-2014) Tenure Committee, Department of Computer Science and Engineering (2005-2006, 2012-2013, 2015-2016) Undergraduate Curriculum Committee, Department of Computer Science and Engineering (2001-2002) Revised 20 August 2017
